offpeak_strategy.title: Off-peak Strategy
offpeak_strategy.description: Choose how to determine off-peak periods.

block_tariffs.title: Block Tariffs
block_tariffs.description: Configure per-block transmission prices and weekend/holiday behavior. Regional Holiday Code: Germany (BW=Baden-Württemberg, BY=Bavaria), France (GP=Guadeloupe, RE=Réunion), Norway (03=Oslo, 11=Rogaland).

data.night_tariff_saturday: Use off-peak all day on Saturdays
data.night_tariff_sunday: Use off-peak all day on Sundays
data.night_tariff_public_holiday: Use off-peak all day on public holidays
data.regional_holiday_code: Regional Holiday Code (optional - Germany: BW, BY, BE | France: GP, RE | Norway: 03, 11)

night_times.title: Off-peak Tariff Times
night_times.description: Specify off-peak start and end times (24-hour format). Regional Holiday Code: Germany (BW=Baden-Württemberg, BY=Bavaria), France (GP=Guadeloupe, RE=Réunion), Norway (03=Oslo, 11=Rogaland).

data.night_tariff_saturday: Use off-peak all day on Saturdays
data.night_tariff_sunday: Use off-peak all day on Sundays
data.night_tariff_public_holiday: Use off-peak all day on public holidays
data.regional_holiday_code: Regional Holiday Code (optional - Germany: BW, BY, BE | France: GP, RE | Norway: 03, 11)

cheap_hours.title: Cheap Hours
cheap_hours.description: Define calculation settings for cheap hours. Any hour where the electricity price is at or below your acceptable price will be considered a cheap hour.

chart_colors.title: Chart Colors
chart_colors.description: Customize colors for ApexCharts dashboard displays. These colors will be used to distinguish different types of hours in your electricity price charts.

error.connection: Unable to connect to the server.
error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to Nord Pool API. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.invalid_country_code: Invalid Nord Pool area code. Must be one of: EE, FI, LV, LT, SE1-SE4, NO1-NO5, DK1-DK2.
error.invalid_vat_rate: VAT rate must be a number between 0% and 100%.
error.invalid_scan_interval: Scan interval must be between 5 minutes (300 seconds) and 24 hours (86400 seconds).
error.invalid_hour_range: Night price hours must be valid hours between 00 and 23.
error.invalid_night_hours: Night price start and end times cannot be the same (except when ending at midnight).
error.invalid_time_format: Time must be valid. For night/day tariff configuration, use 24-hour format (00:00 to 23:59). Example: 22:00 for night start, 07:00 for night end.
